title: (x) Looking for alternatives to Aviano
content:

comments.content:
It will help to know what about Aviano isn't working for you.

Have a look at [Luxury Diamond](http://web.archive.org/web/20141103005720/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=536&subpage=viewfontspecimens).

Truth is, i/work doesnt own it (hence the scan) . I wandered if there was something that i do have on my computer at work that would come in close. I have never used the font or anything similar before, so have never really searched for one similar.

Hope i've been a bit clearer?

thanks.
There aren't any bundled fonts that are very similar. You might have to spring for a font license this time.

any ideas? it would be great to come back with a suggestion! theres a whole world of typefaces on the computers here.

sorry to be a pain!

If it comes down to it, the price is pretty reasonable ($22) at MyFonts:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/dooleytype/aviano/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141103005720/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dooleytype/aviano/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/dooleytype/aviano/")
